name: Fragments of Starlight
description:
Play through this small demo as the last wizard left to fight the corruptions that has taken over the world. The only power that can stop it is that of Starlight, so our brave friend must seek up the fragments of the fallen stars.

This game was made as a wrapper to show of some cool shader effects I made.

But gifs don't quite do them justice, so download and check it out :)
